# King of Mix

is a remix album dedicated to the Japanese group The Blue Hearts. It was recorded by various artists in 1994, but they named their group "Tōzokudan" (盗賊団 Thieves) for this release. Their name refers to Blue Hearts' song "Yoru no Tōzokudan" (夜の盗賊団 Night Thieves) from their album Dug Out.
Background
At the same time the album was released, the group also released a single on an 8 cm CD entitled "The Blue Hearts Hit! Hit! Hit!." The five songs in the medley were "Linda Linda", "Hito ni Yasashiku", "Yume", "Train-Train" and "Jōnetsu no Bara".
